title: Family or friends...?
creator_credit: Filmhouse, Timothy Sullivan and Mario Andreacchio
brief_description: Children from three age groups - five to nine, nine to twelve, and thirteen to eighteen - and different socio-economic classes are interviewed about their feelings on family relationships and the bonds of friendship. Useful for units of study on family relationships, social relationships and peer pressure.
